text: @WhiteHouse Still playing the blame game.  Still not taking responsibility for his slow to react and numerous missteps early in the months when covid-19 first started in the US. Still living in your fantasyland of unicorns & narcissistic adulation.  Hon...the buck stops with you & only you!
